column5: New To The Rental Market!!! Spacious Lake View Home Situated Less Than Two Minutes from All Horseshoe Bay Amenities (Horseshoe Bay Resort, Marriot/Conference Center, Wedding Venues/Churches). Marble Falls is Just Ten Minutes Away- including Waterfront Restaurants, Main Street Antiquing, Brewery, Lake Marble Falls and Kayaking. Surrounding Hill Country Wineries all A Short Drive. Lake LBJ Boat Rentals are Just Two Minutes Away.  Beautifully and Comfortably Furnished Lake View Home.
